mapper.select:
/* admMenuDao.selectMenuList - 메뉴 리스트 */
SELECT A.MG_MENU_SEQ AS mgMenuSeq /*시퀀스*/ , A.MENU_NAME AS menuName /*메뉴명*/ , A.MPG_URL AS mpgUrl /*매핑주소*/ , A.DEPTH AS depth /*뎁스*/ , A.MTR_SEQ AS mtrSeq /*부모시퀀스*/ , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y. %m. %d.') AS regDate /*등록 일자*/ , A.REG_USER_ID AS regUserId /*등록 회원 아이디*/ , DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DATE, '%Y. %m. %d.') AS updDate /*수정 일자*/ , A.UPD_USER_ID AS updUserId /*수정 회원 아이디*/ , A.USE_YN AS useYn /*사용 유무*/ , A.USER_LV AS userLv /*-*/ , IFNULL(A.MENU_INFO, '내용 없음.') AS menuInfo /*메뉴 정보*/ , A.SUM_TITLE_IMG AS sumTitleImg /*대표썸네일이미지*/ , A.DSPL_YN AS dsplYn /*전시 유무*/ FROM MG_MENU A WHERE 1=1 AND DSPL_YN = 'Y' AND USER_LV <= #{userLv} ORDER BY MTR_SEQ ASC
